title: Healthcare, infra clubbed with transformative tech exciting sectors to invest: Vinod Khosla - Economic Times
content: Healthcare, infra clubbed with transformative tech exciting sectors to invest: Vinod Khosla  Economic Times
description: "There are lots of plans and pitches we get on a daily basis that are attractive but they are not large enough for us. We want to invest in very large, transformative tech businesses,"  said Vinod  Khosla while speaking at Unstoppable India, TiEcon Delhi-NCR 2022 event
